paper_abstract: We present a new deterministic algorithm for the #3-SAT problem, based on the DPLL strategy. It uses a new approach for counting models of instances with low density. This allows us to assume the adding of more 2-clauses than in previous algorithms. The algorithm achieves a running time of O(1.6423") in the worst case which improves the current best bound of O(1.6737") by Dahllof et al. (c) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: New upper bound for the #3-SAT problem
